extendedInfo.description: This is the OFFICIAL application of the Ohio State Buckeyes created by the CBSSports.com College Network, in partnership with the University. This exclusive sports application offers LIVE STREAMED games:************************************************************LIVE AUDIO*- Upgrade in the application to stream select games************************************************************* Audio is only available on certain compatible Android devices running OS2.2 or later. In order to access the audio please install the Sports Media Player in Google Play and re-launch this application.Annual Subscription $4.99ADDITIONAL APPLICATION FEATURES-	Live Scoring-	Play-by-Play-	Complete Sport Schedules-	Exclusive breaking sports news-	Video on demand-	Alerts (game start and final scores)-	Team and Coaches Rosters & Bios-	 Much moreâ¦COVERS ALL SCHOOL SPORTS!

reviews.title: Go bucks
reviews.comment: I love this app i get up to date info on the buckeyes i love how to get the schedule for this year season and last year season too
reviews.author: Logan Chess

reviews.title: Texas a&m
reviews.comment: Can u guys make one for Texas a&m please!
reviews.author: Kandi Black

reviews.title: Kelsey
reviews.comment: Good selection of sports, but the live news feed is WAY behind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Live stream doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Get an error says event has not been archived.  I\'d hope not it\'s a live event.  Unless CBS figured out the flux capacitor.  This app sucks.  For $5 you think it would work property.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t waste the $$
reviews.comment: Downloaded and got an error every time I want to stream the game. Requested a refund and never heard back. What a joke. Google get this trash out of here!  I have been in contact with cbs and they do NOT give refunds. Do not download!  Google needs to get rid of this thing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never works anymore
reviews.comment: Used to work great when i first got it but i can\'t get audio anymore .... very frustrating. I paid money for this app too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ripoff
reviews.comment: Downloaded app and then paid $5 to listen to games. Error every time. Be careful.  Still doesn\'t work after update. I have requested a refund. Now they no longer even respond to my emails. Guess I\'m on their sh!t list for my negative review. Update: I have just been informed CBS does NOT ever give refunds for problems with the game audio for this app. Just got another update. The app still doesn\'t work for live audio.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fraud
reviews.comment: CBS has obviously abandoned this app, no audio streaming
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Live Audio DOES NOT WORK
reviews.comment: This is a worthless app and a rip off. CBS sells app functions they cannot support. As of 10/20/12 AUDIO STILL DOES NOT WORK PLEASE REFUND MY PURCHASE.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid RAZR
reviews.comment: Gonna fix the audio problem anytime soon!!!??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need update
reviews.comment: I will give five stars when i can see a score from this week. last time i seen a score was sept 16. It is now oct.6 this app sucks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Come on!!
reviews.comment: Audio still doesn\'t work after update. 2nd week in a row I have missed hearing the game. App doesn\'t work but taking my 5 bucks went thru just fine. And the app is buggy, thanks for letting us be your beta testers. No feed back from developers after several emails. Does not deserve to be associated with The Ohio State University.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow, notifications don\'t work
reviews.comment: I wish I could find a better app for keeping up with my Buckeyes.  This app updates slow, and sometimes not at all.  Also all team sports are set to notify, so you have to go through each one and unselect 2 boxes to prevent from being notified about those sports.  Also,  notifications don\'t work anyway.  I haven\'t been notified 1 time about an OSU football game.  This app pretty much sucks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not stream audio like advertised
reviews.comment: FIX THIS NOW!! FALSE ADVERTISING IS NOT ACCEPTABLE. Google refunded my purchase after developer admitted fault.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the Buckeyes not sure about this app
reviews.comment: The last few days this app hasn\'t been displaying anything. Biggest thing I downloaded this for was football scores, schedules, and news. Everytime I\'ve looked at the football home page it displays nothing. Everytime I check the schedule it tells me there is currently no schedule for this sport check back later. Last I checked, it\'s prime football season. And F.Y.I. this is while connected to wifi.
reviews.author: A Google User
